Package servlet

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddNote
    Servlet implementation class AddNote Adds a note to the budget and returns the list of notes updated
    AddProduct
    Servlet implementation class AddProduct Adds a product to the specified section of a budget
    AddSection
    Servlet implementation class AddSection Creates a new section in a budget
    ChangePassword
    Servlet implementation class ChangePassword Checks the old password introduced by the user and sets the new password as password of the user
    CheckBudget
    Servlet implementation class CheckBudget Checks if the budget is valid, and returns to the creation of the budget with a list of errors
    CreateBudget
    Servlet implementation class CreateBudget Checks the validity of a budget, and sets its creation date.
    Download
    Servlet implementation class Download Gives a response with the requested file: A document, attachment, PDF of a budget, product / client / cover miniimage.
    EmailBudget
    Servlet implementation class EmailBudget Sends a budget by e-mail
    Login
    Servlet implementation class Login Retrieves the user introduced in login.jsp and redirects to index.jsp if success.
    Logout
    Servlet implementation class Logout Removes the session and redirects to login.jsp
    NewBudget
    Servlet implementation class NewBudget Creates a new budget and redirects for editing the new budget
    Remove
    Servlet implementation class Remove Removes the specified document, attachment, section or product in section.
    RemoveCover
    Servlet implementation class RemoveCover Removes the cover from the database and its files
    RemoveMailPassword
    Servlet implementation class RemoveMailPassword Removes the user password for sending emails
    RemoveNotification
    Servlet implementation class RemoveNotification Removes the notification to a user related with a specified budget
    RenameSection
    Servlet implementation class RenameSection Renames a section in a budget
    SaveClient
    Servlet implementation class SaveClient Creates or updates a client
    SaveProduct
    Servlet implementation class SaveProduct Creates or updates a product
    SaveSalesperson
    Servlet implementation class SaveSalesperson Creates or modifies the salesperson with a new e-mail or name
    SelectCover
    Servlet implementation class SelectCover Assigns the specified cover to the budget and returns the list of covers updated
    SendNewPassword
    Servlet implementation class SendNewPassword Changes the password of the user with a random-generated and sends it to him by e-mail
    SetClient
    Servlet implementation class SetClient Updates the client of a budget
    SetConstructionRef
    Servlet implementation class SetConstructionRef Updates a budget with the specified Construction Reference
    SetDiscounts
    Servlet implementation class SetDiscounts Set the percentage of discounts for a product in a budget.
    SetExpirationDate
    Servlet implementation class SetExpirationDate Updates a budget with the specified Expiration Date
    SetGlobalTotal
    Servlet implementation class SetGlobalTotal Updates the GlobalTotal of the budget
    SetMailPassword
    Servlet implementation class SetMailPassword Sets the password as the user password for sending emails
    SetNote
    Servlet implementation class SetNote Updates a budget with the specified final note
    SetPolicy
    Servlet implementation class SetPolicy Modifies the user permissions
    SetProductQuantity
    Servlet implementation class SetProductQuantity Set the quantity of the specified product in the budget
    SetSalesperson
    Servlet implementation class SetSalesperson Set a salesperson to a client
    SetTaxRate
    Servlet implementation class SetTaxRate Updates the tax rate of the budget
    SignOffer
    Servlet implementation class SignOffer Checks the permissions of the user and the validity of the offer, and signs it with the current user
    Sort
    Servlet implementation class Sort Sorts the specified attachment, section or product in section in the required new position.
    UpdatePrice
    Servlet implementation class UpdatePrice Creates a new price for a product
    UploadAttachment
    Servlet implementation class UploadAttachment Loads the attachment and adds it to the budget
    UploadClientImage
    Servlet implementation class UploadClientImage Loads the file and creates the image and miniimage
    UploadCover
    Servlet implementation class UploadCover Loads the cover, creates the image and miniimage and sets the budget to use it
    UploadCSV
    Servlet implementation class UploadCSV Loads the CSV, checks it and updates or creates the listed products
    UploadDocument
    Servlet implementation class UploadDocument Loads the document and adds it to the budget
    UploadProductImage
    Servlet implementation class UploadProductImage Loads the file and creates the image and miniimage
